mapper.select: SELECT c.ID, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, COMMUNITY_TYPE, WRITE_ID, CATEGORY_CODE, c.CREATED_DATE, c.MODIFIED_DATE, c.DELETED, COUNT(cv.COMMUNITY_ID) as countView FROM COMMUNITY c LEFT JOIN COMMUNITY_VIEW cv ON c.ID = cv.COMMUNITY_ID LEFT JOIN COMMUNITY_COLLECTION cc ON c.ID = cc.COMMUNITY_ID WHERE c.DELETED = #{communityDeleted} AND cc.DELETED = #{collectionDeleted} AND cc.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY c.ID, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, COMMUNITY_TYPE, WRITE_ID, CATEGORY_CODE, c.CREATED_DATE, c.MODIFIED_DATE, c.DELETED ORDER BY MODIFIED_DATE DESC OFFSET #{pageNo} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY
